body_html:
@honkentuber Thanks for help,
but not works this way too:
without reshape, error message: ValueError: weights can not be broadcast to values. values.rank=2. weights.rank=1.
with reshape: ValueError: weights can not be broadcast to values. values.rank=1. weights.rank=2.
Tried exactly your line of code, and some variations, results are same. Looks like problem is where weights.rank is adapting to values.rank

body:
@honkentuber Thanks for help,
but not works this way too:
without reshape, error message: `ValueError: weights can not be broadcast to values. values.rank=2. weights.rank=1.`
with reshape: `ValueError: weights can not be broadcast to values. values.rank=1. weights.rank=2.`
Tried exactly your line of code, and some variations, results are same. Looks like problem is where weights.rank is adapting to values.rank
